attributes.title: The WORST
attributes.review: This was just the more horrendous app I have ever downloaded. It hardly works, design is horrible, it has a disgusting name (trump 2020🤮). Should be named Dump trump 2020. I generally had a horrible time for the 2 minutes I had this app. Oh and         F🤬🤬K YOU bunker boy

attributes.title: ALMOST DIED FROM THIS APP
attributes.review: I wanted to show my support to the orange god 🍊🍊 but then when I clicked download it almost upset my tummy and gave my iphone a beautiful virus 🦠, so I couldn’t even open the app ☹️☹️grrrr 😡😡😡So, THAts a one star from me

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app was terrible and did NOT work at all. In addition to this it took almost two days to download. Not worth the wait.
